about.title: I'm Software Developer
about.descr:
I like all that connected with internet, so i'm developing web-applications and sites with minimalistic design and simplicity.
I graduated from universities have a bachelor's degree in economic cybernetics as well as a master's degree in economic informatics.
I have been developing for more than 3 years and open to new directions and opportunities.

directions.descr: Creating web-applications (spa, ssr), responsive and cross-browser sites, working with different APIs.
Design minimalist and simple sites with big variety of animation effects
Since I graduated from economic-cybernetics, I can analyze the data and draw conclusions based on them, build various models of processes

services.section-note: Of course, I can provide other services that are related to the Internet, just contact me for the further details

services.title: Design
services.descr: Design simple and minimalistic UI/UX interfaces (Figma)

services.title: Development
services.descr: Development web applications and sites with modern technologies (ReactJS, VueJS)

services.title: Promotion
services.descr: Promotion of sites as SEO in different search engines (Google, Yandex)

services.title: Support
services.descr: Support for existing projects bug fixing (WordPress, OpenCart, AEM)

skills.title: my work experience
skills.descr: At the beginning of my career I was engaged in website promotion as SEO, then I studied HTML coding and created responsive websites for customers, after that I did an internship in one large company where i created a food delivery web application, after this internship I started working in a company which has own application for searching and buying tickets for all types of transports. Currently work in a company where I am engaged in creating an interface and maintaining for one of the largest technology companies.

contacts.title: just say hello
contacts.descr: I am interested in freelance opportunitie. However, if you have other request or question, just fill the form, and I'll try my best to get back to you!
